## Source: ossf-package-analysis (a1d9976586eae2322ec600c21f4315f9d54ce8aac32d63fc8a605741056e2506)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'hyperion-react-native' @ 1337.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
